title: Places I've Been 2006-2007
name: Places I've Been 2006-2007
description:
A Map by Andybakerut

This map shows the various places I have been during the 2006-2007 academic year.  Included are pictures of the interesting spots encountered along my journeys.

properties.name: Downtown Asheville
properties.description: Posted by AndybakerutAsheville, NCTo get away for the day, Megan and I travelled to Asheville, NC. It is an awesome city and has a great scene. I think it will become a major retirement destination for "snowbirds" from New England and the Northeast. My aunt and uncle moved to the area, enjoying the comfortable climate and great food and art.

properties.name: Emerging Issues Conference
properties.description: Posted by Andybakerut311 Courtland St Ne, Atlanta, GA

properties.name: Martinsville Speedway
properties.description: Posted by AndybakerutPo Box 3311, Martinsville, VAOver the weekend of March 31-April 1, I attended the "Cool Orange 500" NASCAR race in Martinsville, Virginia. This race weekend has become a rite of passage now for the spring season amongst my friends. Go Tony!

properties.name: Neyland Stadium
properties.description: Posted by AndybakerutGO VOLS! Tennessee 35 - California 18.

properties.name: Pete Yorn Concert
properties.description: Posted by Andybakerut 3720 E 82nd St, Indianapolis, INWent to the Pete Yorn concert in August right before I had to go back to Knoxville for the school year. This was the second show of his I saw this summer.

properties.name: Radisson Hotel Waterfront Place
properties.description: Posted by Andybakerut 2 Waterfront Pl, Morgantown, WVIn November, I attended the 2006 SEDAAG Regional Meeting of geographers in Morgantown, WV. I presented a poster that was the outcome of a Geography 517 project that I co-authored with Jamie Phillips. The poster was called, "Designing a Geodatabase to Analyze Commuter Patterns of Metropolitan Knoxville." The picture attached is at the New River Gorge Bridge where we stopped along the way.
